response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the time and effort invested into its creation. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, offering both functionality and prestige. Considering its worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at $10,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a piece that could significantly enhance your collection or operations, depending on your needs. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
